text: Outerbanks Entertainment is the production company of screenwriter Kevin Williamson, based in Los Angeles, California, USA. It produced the CW series The Vampire Diaries (2009-2017). Past credits include Dawson's Creek (1998-2003). It also produced the series Glory Days for The WB and Wasteland for the ABC network. It also served as the production company on Scream 4 (2011) and the Untitled Scream sequel (2022). Its name is a reference to Williamson's origins in Oriental, North Carolina. ==References== Category:Television production companies of the United States
title: Outerbanks Entertainment
